item.description:
Circle The City is a free open streets event happening 3 times this summer.
June 24: Franklin Park
July 15: Open streets surrounding Franklin Park and Jamaica Pond
August 5: Open streets downtown along the Rose Kennedy Greenway

Come join the fun with you friends and family on a bike tour, jog, hula hoop contest, kick-ball game, yoga, you name it! There will be activities for all ages. The kick off is June 24th featuring a performance by the Boston POPS brass ensemble!
For more detail and how to get involved:
http://emeraldnecklace.org/circle-the-city/

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Circle The City, an open-streets event
